Reflections upon what the works commonly call good-luck and ill-luck with regard to lotteries and of the good use which may be made of them / written originally in French by Monsieur Le Clerk, done into English. Reflexions sur ce que l'on appelle bonheur et malheur en matière de loteries et sur le bon usage qu'on en peut faire. English Le Clerc, Jean, 1657-1736.
[26], 199, [3] p.
Printed for Matth. Gillyflower ... Tim. Goodwin, Matth. Wooton, and B. Took, London : 1699.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library. Table of contents: p. [23]-[26] Advertisement: p. [1]-[3] at end.
